description: This Python source file defines a workflow class for content planning, including models for blog analysis, Twitter threads, and LinkedIn posts, as well as methods for scraping blog content, generating content plans, and scheduling/publishing posts. It integrates with external agents, tools, and a scheduler module.

classes.name: BlogAnalyzer
classes.description: Model representing the response from the blog analyzer agent, including the blog title and markdown content.

classes.name: Tweet
classes.description: Model representing an individual tweet within a Twitter thread, including content, hook indicator, and media URLs.

classes.name: Thread
classes.description: Model representing a Twitter thread composed of multiple tweets.

classes.name: LinkedInPost
classes.description: Model representing a LinkedIn post with content and optional media URLs.

classes.name: ContentPlanningWorkflow
classes.description: Workflow class automating blog scraping, content planning for social media, and scheduling/publishing posts.

methods.name: scrape_blog_post
methods.description: Scrapes a blog post URL using the blog analyzer agent, with caching support.

methods.name: generate_plan
methods.description: Generates a content plan (Twitter thread or LinkedIn post) based on blog content and post type.

methods.name: schedule_and_publish
methods.description: Schedules and publishes the generated content using the scheduler module.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main method to execute the workflow: scrape blog, generate plan, and schedule/publish.
